body:
In some situations it may not be in the child’s best interests for parents to work out child arrangements. You’ll probably need to [go to court]({app:urls:route:going_to_court}) if you’re worried about the welfare of you or your children.

You should [report child abuse](https://www.gov.uk/report-child-abuse) or [domestic abuse](https://www.gov.uk/report-domestic-abuse) if you have any concerns.

Read more about the [signs of child abuse](https://www.nspcc.org.uk/preventing-abuse/child-abuse-and-neglect/) and [domestic abuse](http://www.refuge.org.uk/get-help-now/help-for-women/recognising-abuse/).
heading: Protecting you and your children
